title: Strange Brew
summaries: The Strange Brew is a potion that is purchased from the Skeleton Merchant during certain moon phases for 5 each.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, it restores 70–120 <linked>health</linked> and inflicts 40–70 seconds of <linked>Potion Sickness</linked>. It also randomly gives 0 / 1 / 2 / 4 second(s) of damage immunity.

On the <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, it restores 400 <linked>mana</linked> and 80 <linked>health</linked>, and inflicts 60 seconds of <linked>Potion Sickness</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Side Effects May Include:
-Unpredictable Healing
-Inconsistent Potion Sickness
-Brief Periods of Inexplicable Invulnerability
'It looks and smells terrible'
statistics.Buy: 5
statistics.Sell: 1
